item.title: Level Unknown: Backrooms Demo
item.description:
About This Game

Embark on a chilling journey into the unknown with the game "Level Unknown: Backrooms," a horror-puzzle set in the mysterious realm of the Backrooms. Test your logical skills and nerves in both a single-player adventure or a multiplayer cooperative mode.

Immersive Horror-Puzzle Gameplay

Plunge deep into the unsettling depths of terror, navigating sinister corridors and mysterious chambers in the Backrooms. Solve intricate puzzles, confront supernatural entities, and uncover dark secrets that await. The horror, inspired by the best horror films, is guaranteed to keep you on the edge of your seat.

Backrooms Lore

The game faithfully reproduces the Backrooms lore, capturing its key themes and atmosphere. Precise detailing allows players to immerse themselves in this mysterious world. With careful regard to the lore, the game offers a unique experience, transporting players into a surreal space filled with mysteries and puzzles.

Photorealistic 3D Environment

Experience a visually stunning and realistic world, meticulously crafted to immerse you in the nightmarish atmosphere of the Backrooms. Every shadow, every creak, and every flicker of light contributes to the intensity of the experience.

Singleplayer Adventure

Prepare for a solitary journey into the abyss. The single-player mode offers a gripping narrative that unfolds as you explore the haunting Backrooms, with each step increasing tension and horror.

Cooperative Multiplayer Mode

Join forces with friends or other players online to collectively face the terrors of the Backrooms. Communication and collaboration are crucial as you work together as a group. Co-op for up to 4 players elevates the experience to an entirely different level when playing with friends.

Uncover Mysteries

The Backrooms conceal secrets that transcend understanding. Piece together fragments of the story as you progress, uncovering the truth behind the events and learning the fate of those who ventured into this nightmarish dimension before.

Collaboration with Wojtek Gola

As a co-creator and publisher, as well as one of the most influential names in the Polish influencer scene, Wojtek Gola played a pivotal role in the success of the Fame MMA event. Now, he invites you to experience something entirely new. Gather a team with friends and collectively confront the nightmares of the Backrooms in our first collaborative game.

item.title: Dread Dawn Demo
item.description:
About This Game

This is an open-world zombie survival sandbox game set in a city quarantined due to an unknown virus. You will play as a student in the city who failed to catch the evacuation convoy to escape the disaster and was forced to stay. As a modern metropolis, the city is fully equipped with public facilities including hospitals, subway stations, prisons, and schools, where the population density is very high. While exploring the city, you must always be aware of the dangers lurking around you.

You need to stay in the school with the other survivors who remained in the city, defending your camp and surviving.

Utilizing the various materials collected for construction can enhance your camp's defense capabilities. These zombies like to invade your camp when your attention is relaxed.

You can plant some food in the spare areas of your camp, or raise chickens to get eggs. In the absence of food sources, this is a necessary skill for ensuring survival. The surplus crops can also be used for trading with other survivors.

item.title: 环行旅舍
item.description:
About This Game

Unyielding, we journey through the cycle of fate,
Embarking on a lengthy voyage, we drift within the relentless currents of destiny.

Technology advances, and all oracles have gradually materialized into two simple yet infinitely possible words—"ANZI."
All beings glimpse a kaleidoscope of life within these words, vainly attempting to alter their fate. Yet, everyone is swept along by destiny, becoming part of a recurring existence within a grander narrative.

You, as the guide of Kleins, will lead us through the torrents of fate, breaking through all constraining iron walls.
On the path in search of hope, joining hands with characters who refuse to submit to so-called "fate," we march on with determination.

"Guardians Of Kleins" is a 3D real-time strategy tower defense game where you will embark on an unprecedented adventure on the planet "Cosmore" in a near-future fantasy world.

= 3D Real-Time Strategy Game =

"Guardians Of Kleins" features rich strategic gameplay where different combinations spark diverse problem-solving approaches. Each chapter is set in a different terrain with unique features, including minor foes with their own faction traits and bosses with various mechanics. Guides have more room to demonstrate their talents, leading the characters of Kleins to flexibly use their abilities and achieve ultimate victory.

= Exquisite Character Illustrations, Beautifully Presented =

Crafted by experienced artists, the beautiful two-dimensional style character illustrations are unique for each character. Enjoy a refined audio-visual feast with luxurious voice acting from both Japanese and Chinese voice actors. Guides can unlock audio logs of characters by gifting and thereby increasing characters’recognition, deepening understanding of their preferences. Experience this fantasy continent alongside your characters.

= Delicate Storyline, Rich Gameplay =

The main storyline is full of twists, creating finely crafted character images. The company and battles with characters forge bonds. Collect a diverse array of professional characters, form powerful teams, and realize a variety of strategic playstyles. 2D illustrations paired with 3D battle experiences create innovative gameplay. There are rich level modes; brave guides can challenge difficult event levels and experiment with new character combinations.

= Forge Ahead, Embark on Adventure =
The mysterious disappearance of the former guide [Garcia], the worries of your sister [Lucini], the strange dreams that trouble [you]... All these mysteries make the journey fraught with danger; as a [Guide], it's your duty to negotiate with various forces, gaining their help to overcome obstacles on the journey, thereby uncovering the truths hidden behind...

item.title: The Bunker
item.description:
About This Game

Collect all the notepads among different levels and escape without being captured by any zombies that lurk within the bunker

'The Bunker' is a game that takes on the style of a retro horror game from the early 2000's with modern lighting.
With you and up to 5 friends, go into one of the four levels in the bunker, collect all the notepads without being captured by the zombies that lurk within.

item.title: Fist Food
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome to the world of Fist Food, the one-button arcade-style game that will have you on the edge of your pond! Step into the life of a mutant milk frog and spin your way through a bug-filled adventure. With just one button, you'll need to time your attacks perfectly to gobble up every insect in sight, from buzzing flies to speedy dragonflies. But beware, the skies are also filled with explosive mosquitoes that will test your reflexes and strategic thinking.

As the sun rises and sets, you'll spin through different rounds of the day, each with a unique set of challenges and rewards. But don't worry, with your trusty tongue-turned-fist, you'll be able to chomp through entire swarms of bugs, racking up massive combos and earning your spot on the global leaderboards. Just be careful not to hurt your fellow frog friends along the way! So what are you waiting for? Wishlist Fist Food now and get ready to experience the thrill of the hunt in this fast-paced, addictive arcade adventure.

item.title: Aqua Fry
item.description:
About This Game

Dive into the depths of underwater mayhem in this local multiplayer game, where up to 4 players engage in a chaotic free-for-all, akin to shooting pool but with a unique aquatic twist. Aqua Fry combines strategic gameplay, fast-paced action, and a splash of humor for an unforgettable gaming experience.

Embark on an underwater adventure where you control quirky sea creatures in a top-down arena. The objective? Knock your opponents into the clutches of menacing sea creatures, trapping them in bubbles and putting them to sleep. But beware, the colossal Eye enemy is always in hot pursuit, adding an extra layer of intensity to every match.

Key Features:

  • Simple Controls: Joystick + one-button gameplay. Move with the joystick. Shoot, Charge, Defend with any face/shoulder button on your controller.
  • Local Multiplayer Mayhem: Gather your friends or challenge AI opponents in intense 1-4 player local multiplayer matches. The more, the merrier – or in this case, the more chaotic!
  • Free-for-All Gameplay: Experience the thrill of free-for-all gameplay, where every sea creature is out for themselves. Master the art of precision and timing to outmaneuver your rivals.
  • Bubble Tactics: Utilize bubbles as both weapons and shields. Strategically use bubbles to defend against incoming attacks. Bounce the Eye enemy away from you with a well-aimed shot.
  • Dynamic Arenas: Engage in battles across diverse underwater arenas, each with its own challenges and opportunities. Adapt to your surroundings to emerge victorious. Knock around parts of the arena and use the environment to your advantage!
  • Egg-citing Progression: Win matches to hatch one of your five eggs. Successfully hatch all five eggs to face the ultimate challenge: a boss fish showdown. Defeat the boss to unlock new and exciting playable characters. NOTE: All characters have the same abilities.

    Dive in today. Are you ready to make a splash and become the ultimate sea champion?

item.title: Puzzle Maker
item.description:
About This Game

“Puzzle Maker” is a game in which you can create your own puzzles from pictures. Also play one of 40 ready-made animated puzzles, sometimes containing interactive objects.

The game has a lot of room for customization. The settings will help you change the gameplay to suit your tastes. You can change the shape of the borders and the puzzle type to square and polygonal. Add effects to the picture, change the size of the playing field.

A customized insertion and hint system will help you assemble pictures. It is possible to combine pieces with each other before inserting them into the correct place in the puzzle.

A user-friendly interface and beautiful music will allow you to focus on collecting puzzles and enjoy making pictures.

Game Features:
  • Feature to creating your own puzzles
  • 40 built-in animated puzzles. It is possible to disable animation
  • 5 difficulty levels
  • Customization of pieces
  • Hint system
  • Ability to add effects
  • Game settings - screen resolution, music volume, changing the color theme of the game

item.title: NeverGoingHome
item.description:
About This Game

INSANE GAMEPLAY
Ultra fluid gameplay and movement, every slash and dash feels deadly and satisfying!

LEVEL UP!
With a strong focus on upgrading, you will need to level yourself up during your run to stand a chance at completing it.

PLAY YOUR WAY!
Leveling up and mastering skills is the way to victory. Want to get up close and personal? - Upgrade your sword and speed skills!
Don't want to get your hands dirty? - Upgrade your bullet speed and rockets! The choice is yours!

BLOOD, AND MORE BLOOD
The game is cute! but sometimes you will find yourself in piles and piles of blood!

ONE TRY, TRY AGAIN
Dead? You will need to start from scratch! there are no checkpoints and no saving.

LEVELS AND RANKING
Even though your player rank will reset every time you die, you wont lose your career rank which will allow you to start off with better weaponry!

TIME ATTACK
Finish a run in the fastest time possible!, Got a fast run? POST IT for others to challenge you!

ADDICTIVE!
Try it out! - If you have what it takes!

item.title: Spiderbro 2
item.description:
About This Game

Spiderbro 2 is a retro inspired adventure puzzle game for Windows and Linux. You play as Shadowbro, a spider that has to save the multiverse from the antics of a real life computer worm!

EXPLORE, COLLECT ITEMS, SOLVE PUZZLES!
Make your way deeper into the company building by exploring the environment and collecting items for your pockets! Use your pocket items on world objects, give them to NPCs or merge them with one another to solve puzzles!

THE IN-GAME PCs ARE BACK WITH AN UPGRADE!
Use the in-game PCs and check for further clues! Text logs with clues and backstory can be found on PCs found throughout the game! Take a trip to PC-SPACE, a company exclusive VR service that takes using a PC to new depths!

A WORM IS LOOSE! THE MULTIVERSE IS COLLIDING!
A computer worm gone wild has broken into the real world! More cracks and holes to new universes have appeared! In Spiderbro 2 you should expect the unexpected as you overcome the worm whilst travelling between different universes!

DISCOVER COMPANY SECRETS!
Go deeper into the company building and find out what triggered the events of Spiderbro! Each new department will unravel more secrets!

NO NEED TO PLAY THE PREQUEL!
Players need not play the first Spiderbro! Spiderbro 2 expands upon the first game in a way that does not require the player to complete it! Spiderbro 2 also contains a copy of the first game, within the game!

YOU WILL DIE!
Be warned that this world is not safe! Make frequent use of savepoints to prevent losing progress!

EVEN MORE!
  • Cloud saves
  • 34 In-game awards
  • New game plus mode
  • Two possible conclusions
  • Built in Cheat Sheet with all puzzle solutions

CONTROLS
  • Arrow Keys / WASD - Movement
  • SPACE / ENTER - Interact
  • P / E - Open Pockets
  • ESC - Back / Pause

item.title: HOP TOP
item.description:
About This Game

Classic arcade action returns with a brand new look and feel!

The troublesome bugs of Insect Tower took Hop's wings! To get them back, you'll have to chase speedy Wasps and face three kinds of fearsome Flies through five floors of exciting shoot 'em up platforming action. It's up to you to help Hop the Dodo Bird as he hops to the top!

Watch out for tricks and traps, special score items, and even power-up platforms that'll help you turn the tide! Master each insect's specific patterns to score big and blow 'em away!

HOP TOP features 3 modes of play. In Campaign Mode, you'll guide Hop on his quest through the treacherous tower. In Endless Mode, you'll challenge countless waves of bugs and aim for the highest score! Finally, the Arcade Mode honors HOP TOP's arcade origins and shows what it could've been if it really was released back then.

Whichever mode you choose, pick-up-and-play fun awaits you.

item.title: The Witch of Fern Island
item.description:
About This Game





Welcome to the mysterious Fern Island! A lush temperate isle home to three great magical cultures - Boran, Apatut, and Kuqkwa - including one bright-eyed newcomer, Abrill. After crashing onto the island during her travels to a magical academy, the young witch makes the most of the situation, still eager to become a full-fledged Witch. Instead of waiting idly for her arrival, the Academy of Witches also decided to use this as an opportunity for young Abrill to demonstrate her mastery of magic… And unveil the secrets of the mysterious island.

But know this: Becoming the Witch of Fern Island isn't just about passing exams! It's about finding your place in the world, making friends, and most importantly, finding joy within every passing moment.





  • Graduation means meeting the expectations of the Academy's Guardian Witch, and not by sitting through boring lectures. A witch learns on the job!
  • Grow herbs and (magical) plants, raise animals of unusual nature, and experiment with enchantments of plants and animals.
  • Develop Abrill’s own witch brand customizing her witch’s cottage as she sees fit through style and practicality.
  • Of course, a witch is not merely a farmer! Brew magical potions at the cottage, craft arcane amulets and eventually, perform complex rituals to channel raw magic to command the weather.
  • Did we mention that you’ll have the power to control your cat familiar?





  • Learn generations of magical arts here, and the witches’ stories accompanying them.
  • Traverse the Island on foot, from the saddle of an elegant Tzoru, or dart across it aboard a flying broom.
  • There's more than just history to find! Fern Island has been immersed in magic for centuries.
  • Learn more not just about the island’s past, but also its myriad of magical plants, animals, insects, and beautiful vistas.





  • A witch is not just a mistress of magic and an expert in all things arcane. She's also a part of the community!
  • Become immersed in the culture and society of the Boran, Apatut, and Kuqkwa to learn their traditions and beliefs, participate in festivals, and ultimately find true friends among dozens of people.
  • Uncover each new friend’s stories and secrets as Abrill solidifies herself as a part of the community
  • Extend out a caring hand with a witch's touch to assist the locals in their share of problems and leave a lasting impression on every individual to earn the title: The Witch of Fern Island!

item.title: WRATH: Aeon of Ruin
item.description:
About This Game

You are Outlander. Once adrift upon the Ageless Sea, you now find yourself on the shores of a dying world. From the consuming darkness emerges a figure cloaked in white: the Shepherd of Wayward Souls, who burdens you with the task of hunting down the remaining Guardians of the Old World. You must journey into the vast gloom to explore ancient ruins, discover forgotten secrets and battle the horrors that lurk within.



Equipped with weapons of exceptional might and an inventory of powerful artifacts, you must traverse ancient crypts, sunken ruins, corrupted temples and howling forests to bring death to your enemies. But do not underestimate your adversaries, for they are great in power and number. Your mind must be as sharp as your blade if you hope to survive the dangers ahead.



Fueled by legendary Quake 1 technology, the veins of WRATH pump with the DNA of revered '90s shooters. The world of WRATH is rich with engaging combat, diverse environments and captivating lore. Every element is deftly intertwined to create an authentic and enchanting experience as timeless as the games that inspired it.

Highlights:

  • Travel with the Shepherd of Wayward Souls across 3 unique hubs and 15 maps
  • Explore a vast world shrouded in darkness, passionately crafted by the hands of longtime veterans of the Quake scene.
  • Lay waste to 15 unique enemies lurking in the shadows, thirsting for your blood.
  • Defeat the 3 Godlike Guardians of the Old World
  • Exert your dominance through the aggressive dance of combat with 10 unique artifacts
  • Comb each level thoroughly, uncovering secrets to help you survive
  • Immerse yourself in haunting music born from the twisted mind of Andrew Hulshult (Quake Champions, Dusk, Amid Evil and DOOM Eternal: The Ancient Gods Part One).

item.title: Shashingo: Learn Japanese with Photography
item.description:
About This Game

Explore bright, fictional Japanese streets filled with details and interesting objects to capture with your camera. Each photograph you take will translate the name of the content into Japanese and English so you can learn with your surroundings.

Features:

  • A stylised, approachable 3D environment
  • In-game photography system
  • Japanese audio
  • Photo album to store your flash cards
  • A game mode that tests your memory
  • Beginner phrases and grammar lessons
  • Day/Night and weather cycle

Create Stunning Photography Based Flashcards

Every photo flash-card you take will be unique to you. The idea behind this is to strengthen the relationship between a word and how you see its physical appearance. In the real world, you can then see such objects and make connections to the Japanese words you've already learned while playing Shashingo.

Track Your Progress in the Photo Album

Your photo album is where you keep your collection of Photo Flash-Cards. If you remember them well in Find Mode, they'll be separated into the 'mastered' tab and shown with a gold star sticker. However, if you're struggling to remember a word in Find Mode, they'll be marked with a purple exclamation mark sticker, so you know which words you need to practice more.
You can also mark your favourite words & images with a cute little heart sticker to add them to your favourites page.

At the back of your in-game photo album, there are numerous pages of Japanese lessons designed for beginners that will teach you how to speak Japanese and use the vocabulary that you learn in Shashingo. Also included are some key words and important phrases that can help you in your future conversations.

item.title: Drop the Dice
item.description:
About This Game

Drop the Dice is a puzzle game in which you can place your dice anywhere on the board, but you won't score many points. You can also place them by trying to anticipate things and thinking a little in order to score a lot of points!



If you're good, a game should last around fifteen minutes, otherwise it will be much shorter. The advantage is that you can launch several games in 15 minutes.

suitable Times to Play the Game:

  • Margot has given you an appointment at 8:00 p.m. to start a game on another game, but she's late, as usual.
  • You are playing a Battle Royale that no one plays anymore, and searching for a game takes time.
  • You got 15 minutes of public transport to go to buy sandwich at the supermarket or you take the train to go to your uncle's house.
  • You ate too much cheese at the last Raclette, and you need to spend some time in the bathroom without getting bored.



Emma, Isaac, Lucette, Fernand, Valoche and many others will be there to help you go as far as possible in your game and unlock new bonuses! Customize your bonus dice by choosing from the many bonuses available. Adapt it according to your style of playing, be careful, they are not unlimited...

who Did This?!

Drop the Dice is a first solo Gamedev experience which, basically, was only going to be a sandbox to test different things. The desktop & mobile development, art direction, illustrations, sound effects, communication and publication were carried out by me.

♫ The music was happily produced by Alba (bonjourAlba on social media)

i Hope You Like the Game!

item.title: The Game Awards
item.description:
About This Game

THE GAME AWARDS is a mockumentary-style genre swapper that cycles between third-person speed-platforming collectathon, third-person hack-n-slash action title, and third-person exploration/adventure game. Expect platforming, collectibles, enemies to be slashed and defeated, vast maps to be explored, and the occasional linear hallway for narrative purposes. With these ingredients, a lone developer—who started learning Unreal Engine four weeks ago—will (try to) deliver you a game fit to win the "best indie game" award at Jeff Keeley's The Game Awards. Not to be confused with that other popular game awards show hosted by a guy whose name starts with a G.

Key features:
- Three distinct game genres and experiences (Platform! Fight! Walk!)
- A smorgasbord of jokes—written jokes, narrated jokes, visual jokes, and even a few good jokes
- A gripping narrative, depending on your familiarity with game development and Norm Macdonald
- Cinematic presentation and minimal HUD elements offer a premium aesthetic to distract from game mechanic simplicity
- Can be beaten in under two hours, for those of you who don't like games that overstay their welcome

Gameplay:
- Again, there's platforming, fighting (with weapons), and walking (with feet). There are only so many ways to rephrase this information. Press buttons, do things.

item.title: Paranormal: Found Footage
item.description:
About This Game

BACKSTORY

You are a student journalist who decides to make a documentary about the abandoned «North» cosmodrome, where in the 1990s a series of man-made disasters occurred that caused serious genetic changes in humans and animals, forming previously unknown mutations. Almost the entire population was evacuated, and an exclusion zone appeared on the territory of the cosmodrome along with the nearest settlements.

Two of your friends, who are well-versed in these places and know how to get to the abandoned spaceport, are going on an expedition with you. They drove ahead, and you followed them in your car. But halfway along the way, a snowstorm began and you did not notice how you turned the wrong way, strayed from other members of the expedition and got stuck in the middle of the forest in the exclusion zone. Attempts to contact friends were unsuccessful. Deciding that the spaceport is not too far away, you decide to walk the rest of the route alone through the forest, taking your camera with you.

FEATURES

This is a game in the genre of "found footage", where you control the camera of a character in the first person. You will be able to explore a really huge exclusion zone, encounter paranormal phenomena, plunge into the mystical atmosphere of the winter forest and perhaps you will be able to find out the real reason for the closure of the «North» cosmodrome.

Found Footage: Paranormal — offers you a unique experience of immersion in the atmosphere of real chthonic horror, using realistic Unreal Engine 5 graphics, sophisticated sound design and a system of random encounters with entities during your journey. Do not forget, the world in which you find yourself lives by its own rules and your appearance in it will not go unnoticed.

What will you do if you find yourself in the forest at night?

item.title: The Witch’s Cookbook
item.description:
About This Game

Concoct powerful magical potions!


As the most formidable witch in the three kingdoms, you receive numerous requests for powerful spells and magical potions. Lately, it seems like an extra touch of power would not be superfluous at all. Perhaps the charming fairies from your chat could lend a hand?

Play with your community!


Your viewers are kitchen clerks who provide you with all the ingredients you need to create enchanting spells. Each whispered invocation that these culinary fairies inscribe in the ethereal chat will manifest within your bubbling cauldron. Convenient, isn't it?

item.title: Terror At Oakheart
item.description:
About This Game


The renowned slasher horror films of the 1980s and 1990s serve as a source of inspiration for Terror at Oakheart. The community of Oakheart has been terrorized by Teddy, a masked serial killer. As the body count rises, you discover there is more going on here than just a man in a mask killing helpless teenagers.


The side-scrolling, pixel-based game Terror At Oakheart aims to replicate the experience of watching an 80s horror movie. You will play a variety of characters throughout the game, and all of them will perish horribly at the hands of Teddy, a psychotic serial murderer who is under the sway of a Lovecraftian beast. You will move through a number of set pieces in the Town of Oakheart, such as Teddy's house, the nearby police station, a ranger station, camp areas, and more!

Uncover the truth and fight to survive in this unique pixel-based horror game full of gruesome gore and fearful frights!


Enjoy Chapter 1 and the prologue for free as part of the Terror At Oakheart demo! Available now!


Play as a cast of characters who square off against Teddy. Who will survive, and who will be killed in the most horrific ways?

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2530430/Terror_At_Oakheart/

item.title: Mysteryville
item.description:
About This Game

Mysteryville is a classic Hidden Object game that charges you with the task of finding required items buried in various chaotic locations.
Mysterious puzzles, hidden object searches, and a funny adventure are waiting for you!

Something very strange is going on in the town of Mysteryville and as the ace reporter for Countryside Life Magazine, it's up to you to learn the truth!
As you question the strange local townspeople to collect information for your article it doesn’t take long for you to discover that something isn’t quite right in this charming little town… as well as, just how dangerous being a journalist can be.
Your seemingly simple assignment unfolds into a full-blown adventure as you try to learn the secret of the Black Lotus and its ancient prophecy.

Discover new possibilities as you untangle the mystery's tricky plots and solve all of the game’s Puzzles!
Go through 21 locations, interview the town’s residents, figure out their clues and find all the evidence that you need to solve the mystery of the vanishing cats.
With hours of hide-and-seek fun, bizarre characters, and incredible graphics, Mysteryville is a surprising experience for all your senses.

This mysterious crime story and classic hidden object game will be appreciated by cats and kitten lovers.

Features:
- Exciting Hidden Object game - try to find all the clues!
- Mysterious gameplay
- Detective crime story
- Over 20 of different locations
- Gripping soundtrack

Only a true detective can find the missing felines!

item.title: Dicefolk
item.description:
About This Game

Dicefolk is a tactical roguelite game based on customizable dice and monster-catching mechanics. On your adventure as a Chimera Summoner, you'll meet dozens of unique and powerful creatures that you can recruit to create the perfect team.

Play as Alea, a young Dicefolk hero who discovers her ability to befriend Chimera and fight back against evil forces threatening humanity’s extinction.





Embark on a thrilling quest to save humanity from the grasp of an evil sorcerer. Build a team from over 100 unique, hand-drawn Chimera to suit your playstyle. Unlock all the talismans to uncover the mystical secrets behind the Chimeras’ existence.




With a large variety of Chimeras to befriend and command, you'll need to strategize and adapt your playstyle to suit each battle. From tough tanks to speedy attackers, each Chimera brings a unique set of abilities to the table. Your tactical choices will determine your success in battle!




It’s all up to you! Customize your dice for maximum influence over your Chimeras’ attacks and abilities. Control the order in which battles play out and choose when parties take action. Dicefolk defies RNG and gives you unprecedented influence on the roll of the dice!




Each playthrough offers its own rewards, and the Chimeras you encounter in one run can be entirely different than those you find in another. With different Chimeras comes different strategies to assemble your team for the perfect run!

item.title: Code Zodiac
item.description:
About This Game



The Zodiac System is breaking. Only you can fix it.

Play as a young engineer named Leo and fight deadly robots on a quest to save your home planet from the sinister plans of The Stranger.



Boss fights only. Master a fluid and satisfying combat system to take down 10 increasingly difficult bosses.

Slash, shoot, and dodge your way to victory. Land melee attacks to replenish your ammo, then unleash a barrage of long-range attacks at your enemy. This short-range, long-range system infuses boss fights with a steady rhythm and keeps you in the action.

Full animation canceling and freedom of movement means you'll never lose to a cheap shot. Learn your enemy's movements and defeat them through skill.



Leo's planet is a robot-powered utopia, but not all is as it seems.

Talk with locals and discover the source of the Zodiac System's malfunctions.

Get to know a colorful and diverse cast of characters brought to life through hand-drawn portraits.





Join Leo on a globe-trotting adventure across Verge.

Treat your eyes to a beautiful pixel-art world, calling back to the classics of the 16-bit era.

Tune your ears to over a dozen tracks of pulse-pounding and nostalgia-inducing original music.

FEATURES

- 10 unique and challenging boss encounters
- A compelling sci-fi story about the cost of progress
- Responsive and fluid combat
- Pixel-perfect art style and hand-drawn characters
- Completely original soundtrack

item.title: Now Open! Horror House
item.description:
About This Game

This is a simulation management + tower defense game where you play as the "Haunted House Owner." Your task is to faint visitors who come to challenge the haunted house using various frightening mechanisms and props. Unlock different scare devices and strategically place them in the appropriate scenes, continuously upgrading and expanding the venue to create an unbeatable haunted house.
The main gameplay involves scaring visitors, accumulating wealth, and improving and expanding your haunted house.
You can adjust your business strategy by setting ticket prices, various events, and gifts to achieve the most ideal operational effect at the moment.
As the game progresses, visitors will become increasingly braver, so ensuring that the haunted house is not conquered by visitors is your biggest challenge.

item.title: Run Pizza Run
item.description:
About This Game


How long have you waited for a delivery of juicy and delicious pizza?

Welcome to the world of speed, adrenaline, and the most delicious pizza! In "Run Pizza Run," you will find yourself in the role of a brave delivery driver embarking on a dangerous adventure to deliver fresh pizza to specified locations. However, on your path, you will encounter not only hungry customers but also ruthless road monsters - fast and chaotically moving vehicles ready to knock you down at any moment.



Your mission is to skillfully maneuver amid this bustling automotive chaos, where not only your maneuvering skills are at stake but also freshly baked pizza. The more pizza you deliver, the more satisfied customers you will earn.

"Run Pizza Run" is not just a game, it's a real challenge for lovers of extreme adventures. Are you ready to accept the challenge and prove that you are the perfect pizza delivery driver in the most incredible conditions? Open the door and set off on a race for the most delicious pizza in town, where each delivery is a real adventure!

item.title: Alone in the crowd
item.description:
About This Game


Settled on a dystopian future, Alone in the Crowd is a puzzle simulation investigative thriller, where you use a weird variety of gadgets to satisfy this mysterious, self proclaimed friendly AI character.

Confused and scared, you wake up in a strange room filled with all kinds of machinery.
You can't remember what happened, but this secret messenger starts helping you.
There's a lot of questions you want to ask him, but first, he needs your help.
Equipped with surveillance technology, you´re asked to search for specific citizens from the "Box".

Features:
-Play it like a point and click adventure with multiple puzzles to resolve.
-Print and manipulate documents to influence a citizen status.
-Dialogue with boxy, an anonymous character willing to explain you what happened to you and everything else.
-Search multiple cities database for specific citizens' information.
-Play footage from multiple surveillance cameras spread out through the city.
-Play a unique seeded campaign every time you start over.

item.title: SLIPPY THE FROG 🐸💦
item.description:
About This Game

WHOLESOME MINIGAMES / CUTE COMEDY ADVENTURE


You control Slippy the square, soaking, frog as he travels the land solving peoples problems by entering their mind mini games.




Gameplay

  • MIND MINI GAMES - you gotta hop in their heads and fix their problems
  • FRIENDS - Slippy makes, like, a million friends on the way
  • FBI WORK - Slippy is stepping in for the FBI on this job, so the stakes are pretty high
  • FROGS - money back guarantee if there isn't at least one frog in your game
  • PARTY - after completing his job, SLIPPY attends a rad party

Short Game
40 hour games? YAWN - Slippy is short and jam packed with stuff to do.



Interactive
SLIPPY is a fully interactable piece of software known as a computer game.


Thank you for playing my game!
I've loved making this game so thank you for checking it out :D <3

item.title: Northern Tales 6: Oath to the Gods Collector's Edition
item.description:
About This Game

Received a task from Odin to close the rift from which the evil creatures escaped, Ragnar descended into the bowels of the mountains. to the kingdom of the dwarves.
Ragnar told them about his mission and the dwarves let him through. As proof, he showed the amuleted gift by Odin himself.
On the way to the rift, Ragnar was in wait for various dangerous.
Finally reaching the rift, Ragnar threw the amulet into the rift, a flash appeared and the evil was sealed. The dwarves wanted to repay Ragnar for his help and arranged a grand feast.
The next morning, Ragnar said goodbye to the leader of the dwarves. Then the dwarves opened an ancient portal that led to the surface.


Key Features:
- 40 diverse, colorful levels
- Redesigned graphics
- Intriguing plot
- Historical background
- Hidden objects
- A variety of game modes
- Dynamic gameplay
- 5 different bonus levels
- Exclusive wallpapers for your desktop

item.title: Spellarium 2
item.description:
About This Game

That's the Part 2 of our successfull Spellarium series. Our world consists of 6 elements: the Earth, Water,Fire,Light,Darkness and Water. So, we need to create the 7th element.
The game has 110 Match 3 levels plus Solitaires, Spot the Difference and Hidden Objects scenes.
Plus a nice town to build.

item.title: Curse Errant
item.description:
About This Game

item.title: Battle Marine
item.description:
About This Game

Overview

Battle Marine is a simple naval barrage STG.
Enjoy a somewhat retro yet new and exhilarating game experience by firing a barrage of shots, inducing explosions, sweeping with powerful lasers, and automatically collecting medals (recovery and score) by jumping.
Destroying enemies consecutively within a certain time frame will result in a HIT combo. Aim for 999 HITs!
Your rank will be assessed according to the results of your play. Aim for the rank of FLEET ADMIRAL!

Controls

This game can be played with a gamepad or keyboard.

Use the cursor keys to move left and right, press B to shoot, and A to jump.
Press and hold the B button to charge the laser, and release it when the charge is maxed out to fire the laser.
Press A briefly for small jumps and long for large jumps.
Button assignments can be freely customized in the SteamInput menu.

Keyboard Controls (Windows)

  • Cursor keys: D-Pad (Can be changed in the key configuration)
  • X key: A button (Can be changed in the key configuration)
  • Z key: B button (Can be changed in the key configuration)
  • Space key: START button (Can be changed in the key configuration)
  • ESC key: SELECT button (Can be changed in the key configuration)
  • CTRL+X: Exit the game (CTRL+Q, CTRL+C also work)
  • CTRL+R: Reset
  • Alt+Enter: Toggle full screen (CTRL+F also work)
  • CTRL+A: Toggle screen aspect mode
  • CTRL+S: Screen Resolution Settings
  • CTRL+K: Key configuration for the Keyboard

Keyboard Controls (Linux and macOS)

  • Cursor keys: D-Pad
  • X key: A button
  • Z key: B button
  • Space key: START button
  • ESC key: SELECT button
  • Q: Exit the game
  • R: Reset

Notes on the Linux and macOS version

  • Supported screen displays are for Full-Screen and Aspect-Fit only.
  • Keyboard input key assignments cannot be changed.

Detailed Gameplay

  • When you destroy an enemy, a green or red medal will appear.
  • Taking the green medal will restore your LIFE.
  • Your score will increase if you take a red medal.
  • If you keep defeating enemies within a certain time (120 frames), your combo will increase and medals will be collected automatically when you reach 100 HITs or more.
  • Medals are also automatically collected by jumping.
  • You are invincible during the laser (after the firing motion is complete).
  • Unlike normal STGs, explosions also have hit points.
  • If you keep collecting green medals while your LIFE is full, the red medal's base points will continue to increase.
  • The number of crowns at the bottom of the screen will increase for every 16 green medals you take while your LIFE is full.
  • The maximum number of crowns displayed is 30 (480 green medals), but the maximum number of crowns is 4,095 (65,535 green medals).
  • When you collide with enemy bullets, your LIFE will be reduced and the number of crowns will be strongly reduced.
  • With the exception of some enemies (crabs), red medals will appear when enemies are killed by lasers.
  • Obtaining a medal also resets the combo duration to 120 frames

Video distribution, etc.

There are no restrictions on the distribution of this game on TV, YouTube, or other video distribution sites.
Of course, there are no restrictions on monetization.
There is no need to contact the author prior to or after the event.
Similarly, there are no restrictions on publishing screenshots in magazines, web media, social media, etc.

About VGS-Zero

This game is made with the SDK called VGS-Zero.
VGS-Zero is a virtual game machine with a fast 16MHz Z80 CPU, old-fashioned VDP (Video Display Processor) and VGS (chip-tuned sound system).
There may be many 8-bit style games, but the games made with VGS-Zero are real 8-bit games.
If you want to develop games like Battle Marine, please try to develop games with VGS-Zero.
Games you develop with VGS-Zero can be sold on Steam (Windows, Linux and macOS) using the VGS-Zero SDK for Steam.

item.title: GURAGURA ODEN
item.description:
About This Game

Guragura Oden" is a casual balance puzzle game.
Pile up the ingredients high in the unstable shaking earthenware pot.

Ingredients
Ingredients in this game are life forms with faces and hands.
It would be nice if you could take care of them.

Hand-holding
If you connect the hands of ingredients, they are connected and your score will be increased.
If the ingredients are the same, they can be connected by other means than hands, so think carefully about where to drop them.

■Exchange of pots and pans
When all the quota ingredients are placed in an earthenware pot, you can "exchange pots" to move to the next level of pots.
The score is calculated when you exchange pots, so you should pile up as many pots as possible before exchanging pots.

■Skewer
The ingredients and connected ingredients that have been skewered will be fixed to the pot and will not fall out.

Fever skewer
Each time you pile up ingredients, the gauge will accumulate and you can use the "Fever Skewer".
The ingredients that are hit with the "Fever Skewer" will disappear from the pot, so be sure to use it properly.

The game is over when the ingredients fall out of the pot!
Relax and enjoy the game while looking at the cute ingredients.

item.title: Sword Princess Sistina
item.description:
About This Game




1,000 years ago, Demon God Loptr terrorized the world, tormenting and killing millions of humans with his demonic army. Saint Orianne had to call upon all of her power to defeat him, since no one else stood a chance.

Now Loptr has returned, and his first move has already wiped out one of the world's strongest armies. However, it will be some time before he regains his full strength, so his victory is not yet certain.

Sword Princess Sistina is a fairly sheltered young woman, but her combat skills are first class. She sets out on a journey to discover Loptr's weakness and prevent his resurrection, together with her childhood friend Luis and his best friend, Rayne. Luis has the knowledge of a scholar, while Rayne's street smarts are unrivaled.

The three of them will encounter fantastical monsters, religious zealots with their own ideas of how Loptr should be confronted, and other demons who scheme against humanity on their way to fight the Demon God. Through their combined wits and abilities, they must save the Human World or be annihilated by the demons!


In this RPG, every weapon you obtain will teach you new abilities for use in battle. Use status effects and formulate strategies to take down your enemies!

Explore and solve riddles to gain more powerful weapons and items; shops aren't the only source of superior equipment. Just be warned: while bosses have fixed strength, regular enemies grow stronger as Sistina does! Simply grinding won't be enough to secure victory and see Loptr and his underlings defeated.





Explore a Fantastic World
The Human World is split up into multiple continents, and the areas you discover may contain quests that grant weapons and armor you can use to defeat the demons.

Choose Your Strategy
You can fight Loptr with brute strength or follow the clever plan crafted by modern authorities. It's unknown which path will lead to the better outcome...

item.title: Arena 9th
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome to the AUTO-CARD Competition of The Ninth Universe. You can show your skills, enter a higher level of competition, and strive to win the glory of the universe championship.
Don't go to The Eighth Universe. The King of Stomach is not suitable for you. Their meals are calculated by tons. You will not only fail to win the place, but may also become the fresh P-R-O-T-E-I-N!
Don't go to The Tenth Universe, the invisible record of 1600 earth years. If you go there, you may not see anyone!
......
The Ninth Universe is a peace-loving universe. All disputes here can be solved by a game. Be the next champion. There is one seat left on the space flight.

Description

Arena 9 is a strategy card game with misplaced PVP matches, where you can simulate recruiting soldiers, forming teams, defeating enemies, eliminating opponents, gaining higher rankings, advancing to more advanced matches, and finally winning the title of Universe Champion.
The game contains 32 hero cards, 61 soldier cards, 21 spell cards, 14 mask cards, and 24 bonus cards.
All game battle data comes from real players, and there are no "dummies" or "AI" in the game. You'll be matched with other players who have recently completed the same difficulty and received the same resources, ensuring that you don't have to spend a lot of time waiting while playing smoothly. At the same time, after your match is completed, your data will also be acquired and played by other players, and the elimination data of the game is also the real battle data of history.
Since the game is made by myself, the game does not contain special effects, and art resources are not abundant.

Rules of the Game

1. Your character: You play as a contestant from a different universe in the game;
2. Choose a hero: Choose one of the 7 random heroes as the commander and the other as the adjutant;
3. Hero Skills: Commander comes with two skills, Adjutant comes with one skill, which can help strengthen your clan;
4. Soldier Card: You need to place the soldier card in the soldier's position to fight;
5. Mask Cards: Masks can give your soldiers extra skill effects;
6. Spell Cards: Spells can directly strengthen your soldiers, or obtain additional resources;
7. Enemies: Each turn will assign you an enemy, and soldiers on both sides will fight the enemy;
8. Hero Health: Hero Health will be lost when fighting enemies, and will be eliminated when health is reduced to 0, and the later the elimination ranking;
9. Promotion: If you rank higher in the competition, you can advance to a more advanced tournament, the highest level of the competition is the Cosmic Finals;
10. Format: The competition is set up in 9 competition levels, and the number of participants in each level is different, which are "Village League(20)", "Township League(30)", "County League(40)", "Municipal League(50)", "Provincial League(60)", "National League(70)", "Star League(80)", "Galaxy League(90)", "Universe League(100)".
